column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This is one of my favorite ramen spots in Houston! Parking is slightly annoying (in the garage behind it)
column2: and there is always a line. Never be discouraged by the line
column4: and it's worth the wait! Your entire party does have to be there in order for them to seat you. I would recommend smaller groups for this location (and ramen really in general).
